name: Documentation
about: Report documentation issues or suggest improvements
title: '[Docs] '
labels: documentation
assignees: ''
---

## Documentation Issue
What's unclear, missing, or incorrect in the documentation?

## Location
- [ ] README.md
- [ ] CONTRIBUTING.md
- [ ] docs/ folder
- [ ] Code comments
- [ ] Plugin documentation
- [ ] Other: _____

## Current State
What does the documentation currently say (or what's missing)?

## Suggested Improvement
What should it say instead? How can we make it clearer?

## Additional Context
- Is this blocking you from using a feature?
- Would an example help?
- Is this related to a specific plugin or part of the codebase?

## Willing to Submit PR?
- [ ] Yes, I can submit a PR for this
- [ ] No, but I can provide detailed feedback
